dict.string: PestGenie uses your location to navigate to job sites and track service completion.
PestGenie uses your location to provide accurate job site information and route optimization.
PestGenie uses the camera to document job completion and capture before/after photos.
PestGenie accesses photos to attach documentation to job reports.
PestGenie tracks steps to measure technician activity during property inspections.
PestGenie uses motion data to track steps and movement during property inspections.
PestGenie uses your location for route optimization, job site navigation, and automatic arrival/departure tracking even when the app is in the background.
PestGenie may update health data to provide comprehensive activity tracking during work hours.
